column2: Establishment Labs Holdings, Inc. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and marketing of silicone breast implants. The company employs 505 full-time employees The firm is engaged in the designing, developing, manufacturing and marketing of product portfolio consisting of silicone-filled breast and body shaping implants. Its line of silicone gel-filled breast implants, branded as MotivaImplants, is the centerpiece of its MotivaImagine medical technology platform. The Companyâ€™s MotivaImplants are sold in over 60 countries.
